traits.name: Fatal Upkeep
traits.description: Debuffs deal {0} more damage against enemies.

traits.name: Fear Toxin
traits.description: '{Poison} on enemies with {Terror} does {Wild Damage} and deals [1] extra damage for every {0} {Terror} stacks on the enemy.'

traits.name: Incubation
traits.description: '{Poison} no longer triggers at the start of turn. {Poison} damage is doubled. This applies to both allies and enemies.'

traits.name: Plague
traits.description: 'Whenever {Poison} triggers on an enemy: Applies {Poison} to all other enemies.'

traits.name: Poison Glands
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {1} {Poison} to the enemy.'

traits.name: Polluted Aether
traits.description: '{On Attack}: Consumes up to one {Earth} [Aether] to deal a {0;3} {Earth} damage [Hit] and apply {1;1} {Poison} to {target enemy}.'

traits.name: Proliferate
traits.description: 'Whenever this monster applies a debuff: Deals a {3} {Earth}/{Water} damage [Hit] to the enemy.'

traits.name: Toxic Assault
traits.description: 'On every {0} [Crits]: Applies {1} {Poison}, then triggers {Poison}.'

traits.name: Toxic Cycle
traits.description: 'For every {0} {Poison} stacks applied to enemies: Applies {Regeneration} to each ally.'

traits.name: Toxic Earth
traits.description: '{On Earth Action from any ally}: Applies {Poison} to each enemy.'

traits.name: Toxic Shielding
traits.description: 'Whenever {Shield} is applied to an ally: Applies {Poison} to the enemy with the lowest amount of {Poison}.'

traits.name: Endless Endurance
traits.description: 'Gains {Aging}. For every {0} Age: Applies {Redirect} and {Shields} self for {1;2} x {1;1}.'

traits.name: Flawless Defense
traits.description: {Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self.\nFor every {1;0} {Shield} gained, gain {Power}.

traits.name: Incorruptible
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Applies {0;1} {Shield} to self. On every {1;0} {Retaliates}: Additionally cleanses {1;1} {Corruption} from self.'

traits.name: Mesmerize
traits.description: 'Whenever an enemy’s {Weakness} is consumed: Applies {Redirect} to self.'

traits.name: Nimble Guardian
traits.description: 'Whenever Dodge is applied to this monster: Applies Dodge and Redirect to self.'

traits.name: Protector
traits.description: As long as this monster has {Redirect}, allies gain +{0;0} {Defense} and +{1;0} {Shielding}.

traits.name: Purge Punishment
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: If this monster has {C0%} or more health, {purges} {1} enemy [Aether].'

traits.name: Recovery
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: This monster heals itself equal to [1]/{0} of the damage it took last round.'

traits.name: Return To Aether
traits.description: '{Retaliate}: Generates {Random Aether}.'

traits.name: Safeguard
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn, if this monster has less than {0} {Shield}: {Shields} self equal to the difference.'

traits.name: Shielded Torment
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: {Shields} self for {1} for every debuff stack on it.'

traits.name: Taunt
traits.description: 'At the start of combat: Applies {0;1} {Redirect} and {Shields} self for {1;2} x {1;1}.'

traits.name: True Grit
traits.description: 'Whenever {Redirect} is applied to this monster: {Shields} self for {1}.'

traits.name: Conversion Pact
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Deals a {Fire}/{Water} hit to all enemies; damage equals debuffs cleansed or consumed from allies this round.'

traits.name: Cosmic Torment
traits.description: 'For every {0} debuffs applied to allies: Generates {Wild} [Aether].'

traits.name: Healthy Cleanse
traits.description: 'At the start of your turn: Cleanses {1} debuffs from each ally. Whenever a debuff is cleansed from an ally: Heals them and {Shields} them for {1;1}.'

traits.name: Overheat
traits.description: 'At the end of your turn: Triggers {Burn} on each enemy with {C0} or more {Burn} and applies {1;1} {Burn} to this monster for each one.'

traits.name: Peak Performance
traits.description: 'Whenever an ally reaches [4] debuff stacks: Applies {Power} and {Shields} them for {1;1}.'

traits.name: Perseverance
traits.description: 'Whenever a debuff is applied to an ally: {2%} chance to apply {Dodge} to them.'

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.description: 'Whenever {Regeneration} is consumed by an ally: Cleanses {0} debuff stacks from them and applies them to random enemies.'

traits.name: Shared Torment
traits.description: 'Whenever a debuff stack is applied to this monster: Applies the same debuff to another random ally or enemy.'

traits.name: Tainted Power
traits.description: 'Whenever {Power} is applied to an ally: Applies {Power} and {1;1} {Affliction} to them. '

traits.name: Torment Doubling
traits.description: '{On Action}, if the {Action} applied debuffs to enemies: Applies those debuffs another time to the enemies and to self.'

types.name: TypePoison
types.description: This Type focuses on Poison stacks, which deal constant damage to enemies each turn.

types.name: TypeTank
types.description: This Type focuses on protecting other allies and retaliating against enemies.
